bug.question: I have spots and fly. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I have lots of dots!
🦋 I have wings!
🌱 I like to land on flowers!

bug.question: I make honey. Who am I?

hints.text: 🟡 I am yellow and black.
🐝 I buzz!
🍯 I live in a hive.

bug.question: I like to crawl and have many legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small
🥾 I crawl on the ground.
💪 I can carry food!

bug.question: I jump very high and eat plants. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am often green.
🎶 I make a chirping noise!
🌿 I hop around in the grass.

bug.question: I spin a web. Who am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I make sticky traps.
🕷️ I have eight legs.
🏠 I live in a corner.

bug.question: I crawl on leaves and then make a cozy sleeping bag. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I turn into something new.
🧣 My cozy bag is called a cocoon.
🦋 I eat leaves!

bug.question: I fly around at night and like bright lights. What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 I come out when it's dark.
💡 I flutter near lamps.
⚪ I am often white or brown.

bug.question: I dig in the ground and wiggle around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌧️ I like wet places.
🕳️ I make tunnels.
🚫 I don't have any legs.

bug.question: I am long and thin, and I march in a line. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very strong for my size.
🤝 We work together.
🌳 We live in colonies, sometimes in trees.

bug.question: I have big eyes and like to fly near ponds. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I live near the water.
🌈 My wings are colorful.
👀 I have very large eyes.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, and you need an umbrella. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am wet.
☔ Sometimes there are big drops, sometimes small.
🌧️ Plants need me to grow.

weather.question: I'm big and yellow and hot. I make you warm. What am I?

hints.text: 🔆 I shine in the day.
🌻 I can help flowers grow.
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm very bright.

weather.question: I am white and cold, and I fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of tiny ice crystals.
☃️ You can build a snowman with me.
🧤 You wear gloves when I am around.

weather.question: I move the leaves on the trees and make the kites fly high. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 You cannot see me, but you can feel me.
🍃 I make windmills turn.
🪁 I can be gentle or strong.

weather.question: I'm gray and fluffy and float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I can block the sun.
🐑 I look like fluffy sheep.
💧 Sometimes I am full of water.

weather.question: I come after the rain, and I have many colors in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I'm a curved line of colors.
🌦️ I appear when the sun shines through the rain.
🔴 I have red, yellow, and blue.

weather.question: I am very bright, flash in the sky, and come with thunder. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am a spark of electricity.
⛈️ I am part of a storm.
🔊 After me, you hear a loud boom.

weather.question: I am a loud noise in the sky that comes after lightning. What am I?

hints.text: 💥 I sound like a big boom.
⛈️ I am part of a storm with lightning.
👂 Sometimes I can make you jump.

weather.question: Sometimes the ground is covered in white in the morning, it disappears when the sun comes out. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 It's like tiny drops of water that freeze on the ground
❄️ It appears when the night is cold and clear
🧊 It is cold and melts quickly.

weather.question: When the sun shines on the rain, what is created?

hints.text: 🎨 It has a lot of colors
💧 It only appears when rain and sun happen together
🌈 You can never reach the end of it.
